catch_copy: Make use of various weapons to eliminate the enemy assassins
copyright_text:
THE OUTFOXIES™& ©Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.
Arcade Archives Series Produced by HAMSTER Corporation
description:
"THE OUTFOXIES" is an action game released by NAMCO LIMITED (current Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1995.
You select one of the world’s top assassins as your protagonist, and under the orders  of a mysterious billionaire, your mission is to eliminate all the others.
Whether for the reward, for pride, or simply for the thrill of combat…
A  no-rules showdown among the world’s  most dangerous professionals is about to begin!

The “Arcade Archives”series is developed with the concept of faithfully reproducing classic arcade games. It also includes convenient features such as difficulty and screen settings, rewind, rapid-fire, and multiple save slots. In addition, players can compete for the best scores with players around the world through online rankings.
“Arcade Archives 2” adds a new “TIME ATTACK MODE” to the lineup of “ORIGINAL MODE,” “HI SCORE MODE,” and “CARAVAN MODE” included in the Arcade Archives series. In “TIME ATTACK MODE,” players compete to clear the game as quickly as possible, regardless of the score achieved. VRR (Variable Refresh Rate) support has also been added, allowing gameplay to be reproduced even closer to the original arcade experience.
Please enjoy these iconic arcade games that defined an era with the “Arcade Archives” series!

*The options menu and manual are available in Japanese, English, French, German, Italian, and Spanish.

notices.text:
*This product can only be played on Nintendo Switch™ 2.
In addition to this product, there is also Nintendo Switch™ "Arcade Archives THE OUTFOXIES ".  There is no compatibility between this product and the save data or additional content of "Arcade Archives THE OUTFOXIES ". Please be careful not to purchase duplicates or the wrong product.
*If you have purchased Nintendo Switch™ "Arcade Archives THE OUTFOXIES," you will be able to purchase Nintendo Switch™ 2 "Arcade Archives 2 THE OUTFOXIES " as part of a "Game Owner Discount" service.
